name: Dumber League
summary:
Here comes a totally new soccer game you have never played! Funny and uproarious matches of people who know nothing about soccer! Two lazy guys who don't know the rules of soccer challenge to a soccer match of their town. There are no difficult rules!
The only thing that's important is to kick around a ball and put it in the opponent's goal!
Watch their sweat, tears and slapstick moments.
